historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 40-603.

1973 Ed., § 40-1103.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-104, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-2301.01.

For D.C. Law 13-289, see notes following § 50-401.

Transfer of Functions

The functions of the Department of Transportation were transferred to the Department of Public Works by Reorganization Plan No. 4 of 1983, effective March 1, 1984.

DC CODE § 50-2301.03

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Purposes; Definitions; Establishment; Hearing Examiners; Sanctions; Time Computations; Regulations. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Bureau of Traffic Adjudication and Bureau of Parking and Enforcement established. [Repealed]
